attributes.description: REVERSE CAMERA, TOWBAR, PDC! STUNNING LITTLE AUTO CAR! We at Stander Motors pride ourselves in delivering excellent service. We are a family business that opened our doors in 1989 in Dunnottar, since then we moved our business to Nigel in 1994. Come and visit us on 66 Hendrik Verwoerd Str Nigel and meet our friendly staff. We go the extra mile to give our clients only the best. Contact us: Sales manager: Nico Stander Cell: 0832818539, Salesman: Hennie Bezuidenhout Cell: 0824986428, Stephen Gillmer Cell: 0799974729, Christo Pretorius Cell: 0734876436

attributes.description: lovely low mileage example of the gorgeous XK.  They are difficult to find and not without good reason. Nobody wants to part with them !!  They are proven, have no obvious weaknesses, the drivetrain having proved itself  over the last decade. A good looking convertible in just the right colour combination.   4.2 litre 32 valve normally aspirated engine produces a reliable and absolutely unstressed 300 bhp.  This is luxury on an unparalleled scale once you factor the price in. Highly recommended.
